summary: This document is a series of email exchanges from January 2020, primarily concerning the scheduling of a presentation by defense counsel to a group referred to as 'full brass'. The emails coordinate availability for a meeting, ultimately settling on Friday, January 24, 2020, at 3:30 PM.

events.title: Scheduled Defense Counsel Presentation
events.description: A presentation by defense counsel is scheduled for 'full brass'. The meeting time is set for 3:30 PM, with a duration of 60-90 minutes.

keyFacts: The emails are scheduling a presentation by defense counsel to 'full brass' in January 2020.
The final agreed time is Friday, January 24, 2020, at 3:30 PM.
The meeting duration is noted as potentially 60 or 90 minutes.
The correspondence involves coordination around the schedules of multiple parties, including someone with meetings with 'all of the Judges'.
No specific individuals are named in the provided text; all references are to roles or groups (e.g., defense counsel, full brass).
